title: 06/28/21 DPS Hour 3 Scottie Pippen
itunes:title: 06/28/21 DPS Hour 3 Scottie Pippen
description:
Scottie Pippen tells Dan that he deserved to take the final shot when he was with the Bulls. Scottie says he has no problem with folks thinking that he called Phil Jackson a racist.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
